text:
Use cofunction identities and trig identities to find the indicated trig functions

\begin{array}{l}\n\csc \theta=\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2}, \sec \theta \frac{\sqrt{13}}{3} \\\n\tan \theta=\n\end{array}[imath]\csc \theta=\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2}, \sec \theta \frac{\sqrt{13}}{3} [/imath] [imath]\tan \theta=[/imath]
